# 95. Added CouchDB Upgrade Guide

**Date:** 2026-01-22

**Optional per env:** _only required on some environments_


## CommCare Version Dependency
This change is not known to be dependent on any particular version of CommCare.


## Change Context
Added a new step-by-step documentation guide for upgrading CouchDB nodes.
This guide covers the process for taking nodes out of the load balancer,
performing the upgrade, and verifying the changes.

## Details
The guide involves:
- Setting up environment variables.
- Deregistering the node from the application load balancer (ALB).
- Stopping pillows and putting the node in maintenance mode.
- Creating a snapshot.
- Running the deployment playbook.
- Verifying the upgrade.
- Restoring the node to service.

The guide is available at `docs/source/services/couchdb/upgrade.rst`.

## Steps to update
No action needed.
